title: 2 Months Kidney Cleansing Diet Plan

cleaned_text: The kidneys act as the body's natural filtration system, removing waste products, toxins, and excess water from the blood. When the body absorbs enough water, the kidneys clean themselves. Kidney cleansing involves removing toxins from the body and ingesting certain foods and herbs that help promote kidney health. Kidney cleansing programs vary, but usually include a few days of diet. This diet may include smoothies, juices, teas, herbs, and foods which will help detoxify the body and improve kidney functioning. 2 months Kidney cleansing Diet plan -7,000 INR OR 13,909 INR (OUTSIDE INDIA) **9 CALLS WITH HEALTH COACH**
